title: A Sticky Legal Situation (If You Lick the Back)
teaser: What’s more American than the Statue of Liberty? How about a sexier version of the iconic statue outside a casino in Las Vegas, which is now the subject of a lawsuit with the US Postal Service – with a little unapologetic consumerism thrown in? Lizzie O’Leary of Marketplace explains.
contentencoded:
What’s more American than the Statue of Liberty? How about a sexier version of the iconic statue outside a casino in Las Vegas, which is now the subject of a lawsuit with the US Postal Service – with a little unapologetic consumerism thrown in?


Lizzie O’Leary of Marketplace explains.
